short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to work out your brain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Gameplay: Experience a blend of addition and subtraction questions that adapt based on your performance.
Increasing Difficulty: Conquer the challenge by answering questions correctly and watch as the difficulty level rises.
Against the Clock: Race against time with a countdown timer to add an extra layer of excitement.
Three-Figure Operations: Reach a milestone of 20 consecutive correct answers to unlock challenging three-figure operations.
Sleek Design: Enjoy a visually pleasing and user-friendly interface for an immersive gaming experience.
